Keep things simple and comfortable with this set of everyday cotton-rich trunks. The pack of five come in various colours with elasticated waistbands branded with the number 1884. They feature added stretch for extra movement. All of the cotton for our clothing is responsibly sourced and always will be.

Gaming fans will love these cotton-rich Xbox™ trunks. Added stretch brings extra comfort. Pack of three pairs includes designs with controllers, the Xbox™ logo and a mesh graphic. The waistbands carry the Xbox™ name. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be.

Make your little princess feel like a star with this charming midi dress. Designed with a cinched smocked waist, tiered ruffles, and an adorable floral print, this dress is perfect for any occasion. The soft and breathable viscose-mix fabric ensures comfort throughout the day, while the round neck and three-quarter sleeves add a touch of playfulness. Dress it up with ballet flats for a special event or pair it with sneakers for a casual day out.

With its frills and twirly tiered shape, this woven dress is perfect for special days. Easy regular fit, with a fun animal print. Shirred cuffs on the long sleeves ensure a cosy feel. Neat button fastening at the back.
posts.post_title: Animal Print Tiered Frill Dress (6-16 Yrs)

posts.post_content: With its fresh daisy print, this pure cotton dress is a lovely choice for sunny weather. Comfy regular fit, with breezy short sleeves and a square neckline. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.
posts.post_title: Pure Cotton Daisy Print Dress (2-7 Yrs)

posts.post_content: Add a touch of space exploration to their wardrobe with these cotton-rich shorts. Comfy regular fit with drawstring fastening. Contrasting vertical stripes give a laid-back look. Flap pockets on each leg, one with the NASA™ logo and the other with a classic rocket print. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

This pure cotton Looney Tunes™ t-shirt adds a cute touch to their casualwear. Regular fit design. Features a Bugs Bunny and Lola graphic and the beloved slogan 'That's all folks.' We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.
posts.post_title: Pure Cotton Looney Tunes™ T-Shirt (6-16 Yrs)

posts.post_content: We've created this pure cotton t-shirt to celebrate Percy's birthday. Designed in a comfy regular fit, it has casual turned-up sleeves and a classic round neck. It features a fun party scene print on the front with Percy Pig™ in the centre, complete with a glitter cake and balloons. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.
posts.post_title: Pure Cotton Percy Pig™ T-Shirt (2-16 Yrs)

posts.post_content: This pure cotton twill outfit will have them looking cool and feeling comfortable. Cut in a regular fit, this two-piece set comprises a tee and a long-sleeved overshirt so they can layer up when it gets chilly. The overshirt features a smart point collar, handy button closure and stylish patch pockets. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.
posts.post_title: 2pc Pure Cotton Twill Shirt and T-Shirt Set (6 - 16 Yrs)

posts.post_content: Perfect for dinosaur fans, this pure cotton t-shirt features a tactile camouflage Jurassic World™ logo on the front. Comfy regular fit. Finished with the slogan 'Life finds a way.' We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.
